tier_1_enhanced_direct.description: Enhanced direct mentions including year-specific and Hospital Linkage File variations
queries: TITLE-ABS-KEY(("AHRQ Compendium of U.S. Health Systems") OR ("AHRQ Compendium of US Health Systems") OR ("AHRQ Compendium" AND "Hospital Linkage File") OR ("AHRQ Health System Compendia"))
TITLE-ABS-KEY(("2018 AHRQ Compendium") OR ("2019 AHRQ Compendium") OR ("2020 AHRQ Compendium") OR ("2021 AHRQ Compendium") OR ("2022 AHRQ Compendium") OR ("2023 AHRQ Compendium"))

tier_2_ordered_proximity.description: Using PRE/n for ordered proximity searches
queries: TITLE-ABS-KEY((AHRQ PRE/5 Compendium) OR ("Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality" PRE/10 Compendium) OR (AHRQ PRE/3 "Hospital Linkage File"))

tier_3_key_paper_citations.description: Citations to key papers known to use AHRQ Compendium
queries: REF((Contreary AND "Health Affairs" AND "2021") OR (Furukawa AND AHRQ AND "2020") OR ("Consolidation and Mergers among Health Systems"))
REF(("RAND" AND "hospital prices" AND "health systems") OR ("Mathematica" AND "health system" AND AHRQ))

tier_4_system_definition_focus.description: Searches focusing on how AHRQ is used for system definitions
queries: TITLE-ABS-KEY(("health system definition" OR "hospital system affiliation" OR "system linkage") AND (AHRQ OR "Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality"))
TITLE-ABS-KEY(("hospital ownership" OR "system membership" OR "health system identification") AND AHRQ AND (data OR compendium))

tier_5_indexed_terms.description: Using INDEXTERMS field for controlled vocabulary
queries: INDEXTERMS("health systems") AND TITLE-ABS-KEY(AHRQ AND (compendium OR data OR linkage))
INDEXTERMS("hospital systems") AND TITLE-ABS-KEY("Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality")
REF(("AHRQ Compendium") OR ("Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality Compendium") OR ("AHRQ" AND "Hospital Linkage File"))
REFAUTH(("Rich E" OR "Contreary K" OR "Furukawa M")) AND TITLE-ABS-KEY("health system*")

tier_7_combined_proximity.description: Complex proximity searches combining multiple terms
queries: TITLE-ABS-KEY(((AHRQ OR "Agency for Healthcare") W/10 (compendium OR "linkage file")) AND "health system*")
TITLE-ABS-KEY((hospital W/5 (affiliation OR ownership)) AND AHRQ W/15 (data OR compendium))
